amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to provide any assistance to any country identified by the Department of Agriculture as a country that prohibits the importation of U.S. beef from animals less than 30 months of age.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Musgrave amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mrs. Musgrave.
